reviewText: Very happy that I purchased this DVD. It is a great look back at drag racing in the days before it morphed into the traveling show (with a handful of racers) that is seen at today's NHRA national events.
Great video on the golden age of drag racing and the pioneers who were part of it.
Its ok, not what I thought it would be.
My husband really enjoyed it the video called Slingshot. It had a lot of the older dragsters in it and he likes that.

I bought this video for my husband because he is a nostigla drag racing fan. We always go to the NHRA Hot Reunion's. He loved the video and I am glad it was a hit! He added it to his collection, and said he has never seen this video at any of the Hot Rod Reunions. Glad I bought it!
